participant_1.background:
I am not rich, but I am trying to learn Swedish because I love hockey and I want to be more comfortable in Sweden.
i want to be a doctor when i graduate.
I would brag about skiing down mountains despite my fear of heights.
i grew up as an orphan.
i like to build things.

participant_2.background:
My family is proud of my decision to become a police officer.
I like to try new restaurants and my favorite place to eat recently is this new sushi place that just opened up.
I drive a Subaru Outback because it's a practical car for getting to the lake and for carrying all my books.
My best friend died in a car accident when we were in college.
my son was born completely blind.

content.text: Hey, nice to meet you too! What do you do for a living?
I'm a med student, trying to decide where I want to do my residency.
Oh cool, my family is proud of my decision to become a police officer.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll make a great officer.
Thanks! I do my best. What's your favorite hobby?
I like to build things. I'm not very good at it, but it's fun.
That's cool! I like to try new restaurants. My favorite place to eat recently is this new sushi place that just opened up.
Sushi is delicious! I love trying new foods.
Me too! I'm always looking for new places to eat.
I'm not sure where I want to do my residency. I'm thinking maybe Sweden. I love hockey and I want to be more comfortable in Sweden.
That's cool! I've never been to Sweden. I hear it's beautiful.
It is! I've been there a few times and I love it.
I'm sure you'll have a great time there!
Thanks! I'm looking forward to it.
